question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the entrance of the community and see a parking space on the right. Given the next steps for [planned milestone], what are your next steps?  
choose:  
A. I rise.  
B. I rotate the camera downward.  
C. I fly forward.  
D. I turn left.  
E. I turn right.  
F. I rotate the camera upward.  
G. I descend.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: To navigate to the entrance of the community and see a parking space on the right, turning right is the logical next step based on the layout of the environment shown in the images. This direction aligns with the goal of approaching the community entrance while keeping an eye out for the parking space on the right side.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 49)]
Option: [E]
Reason: From the initial position (0:00-0:10), the agent is looking at a city with roads. To navigate to the entrance of the community and see a parking space on the right, the agent needs to turn right at the intersection (0:37-0:49).
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: To navigate to the entrance of the community and see a parking space on the right, turning right is the logical next step based on the layout of the environment shown in the images.
